name: RiceandEggs
instructions: Put the rice in the rice cooker. Cut the bacon into small pieces, then cook the bacon until cripsy. Turn off the frying pan until the rice is done, then add it into the bacon. Cook for another few minutes then add the eggs. Once the eggs are safe to eat then stir and add the cheese. Once the cheese is fully melted then serve with diced tomatoes.
note: Good with tobasco sauce, siracha sauce, katchup, or any tomato based sauce.
